context_bundle.summary: GitHub to CurseForge automated release workflow for WoW addons. Covers webhook setup, tagging conventions, and the full release process.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Ensure TOC has X-Curse-Project-ID. 2. Commit and push changes. 3. Create annotated tag: git tag -a 1.0.1 -m "message". 4. Push tag: git push origin 1.0.1. 5. CurseForge auto-packages within minutes.
known_errors: Tag push without webhook = no CurseForge build
Tag containing 'alpha' or 'beta' changes release type
Re-push tag to re-trigger: delete remote, delete local, recreate, push
